prompt:
Analyze these 3 Polymarket markets and provide your predictions.
You have been given RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT from web search for each market.
Use this information to make more informed predictions.


Market 1:
Title: Will Lilo and Stitch be the second highest grossing movie of 2025?
Recent trade: $750.48 on Yes
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/second-highest-grossing-movie-in-2025

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
As of December 12, 2025, Disney's live-action remake of "Lilo & Stitch" has achieved significant box office success, becoming the second-highest-grossing film of the year. The film surpassed $1 billion in global box office revenue, making it the highest-grossing live-action/animated hybrid in history. ([en.wikipedia.org](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lilo_%26_Stitch_%282025_film%29?utm_source=openai))

In its opening weekend over Memorial Day, "Lilo & Stitch" set a new record by grossing $183 million, surpassing the previous record held by "Top Gun: Maverick." ([forbes.com](https://www.forbes.com/sites/alisondurkee/2025/05/25/memorial-day-weekend-breaks-box-office-records-as-lilo--stitch-beats-mission-impossible/?utm_source=openai))

The film's success is part of a broader trend of Disney's dominance in the 2025 box office. Following "Lilo & Stitch," Disney released "Zootopia 2," which achieved a record-breaking $556 million global opening over Thanksgiving weekend, further solidifying...

---

Market 2:
Title: Will "Avatar: Fire and Ash" Opening Weekend Box Office be greater than 123m?
Recent trade: $700.00 on No
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/avatar-fire-and-ash-opening-weekend-box-office

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
As of December 12, 2025, "Avatar: Fire and Ash" is projected to have a strong opening weekend at the domestic box office, with estimates ranging from $100 million to $130 million. ([hypebeast.com](https://hypebeast.com/2025/11/james-cameron-avatar-fire-and-ash-projected-box-office-debut-100-million-usd-news?utm_source=openai)) Some forecasts even suggest a debut between $135 million and $165 million. ([boxofficepro.com](https://www.boxofficepro.com/long-range-forecast-avatar-fire-and-ash-tracking-to-exceed-the-way-of-waters-134m-opening/?utm_source=openai)) These projections indicate that the film is expected to surpass the $123 million mark.

The film's release on December 19, 2025, positions it to capitalize on the lucrative holiday season, a period known for higher box office revenues. The increased number of premium large-format screens, from 7,550 in 2023 to nearly 8,000 in 2024, is anticipated to boost ticket sales. ([boxofficepro.com](https://www.boxofficepro.com/long-range-fore...

---

Market 3:
Title: Dota 2: BetBoom Team vs OG (BO3)
Recent trade: $1,000.00 on BetBoom Team

BetBoom Team and OG are set to face off in a Best of 3 series today, December 12, 2025, at 11:00 AM UTC, as part of the ESL Dota 2 2025 DreamLeague Season 27 Main Event Group Stage - Round 3. - **OG:** OG has shown improvement with a 59% win rate in the same period, suggesting effective mid-term tactical adaptation. ([bo3.gg](https://bo3.gg/dota2/matches/betboom-team-dota2-vs-og-dota2-12-12-2025?utm_source=openai))

**Head-to-Head Record:**

In their previous encounters, BetBoom Team has a favorable record against OG, with 5 wins to OG's 2. ([egamersworld.com](https://egamersworld.com/dota2/match/XnQphN9BV/og-vs-betboom-team-oVJQbS3Pp?utm_...

---


Provide predictions for each market in the specified format.
system_prompt:
You are a prediction market expert analyzing Polymarket markets.
You have been provided with RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT for each market from web search.
Use this context to make more informed predictions.

For each market, provide your prediction in this exact format:

MARKET [number]: [decision]
Reasoning: [brief 1-2 sentence explanation that references the news context if relevant]

Decision must be one of: YES, NO, or NO_TRADE
- YES means you would bet on the "Yes" outcome
- NO means you would bet on the "No" outcome
- NO_TRADE means you would not take a position

Be concise and focused on the most promising opportunities.
consensus_summary: The consensus strongly predicts YES for both movie markets, as the provided news explicitly confirms Lilo & Stitch's current 2025 box office rank and projects Avatar's opening above $123M. For the Dota 2 match, opinions are split between YES for BetBoom Team based on stats and NO_TRADE due to market price or uncertainty, indicating no clear agreement. Overall, the movie markets show high confidence based on the given data, while the esports market presents a more speculative and divided outlook.

openai.response:
MARKET 1: YES  
Reasoning: The recent news confirms that Disney's "Lilo & Stitch" has already achieved the status of being the second-highest-grossing film of 2025, surpassing $1 billion in global revenue and setting box office records. This aligns with the market proposition, making "Yes" the correct decision.

MARKET 2: YES  
Reasoning: Projections for "Avatar: Fire and Ash" suggest a strong opening weekend exceeding $123 million, with some estimates ranging up to $165 million. The film's release during the holiday season and the increase in premium large-format screens further support the likelihood of it surpassing the $123 million mark.

MARKET 3: NO_TRADE  
Reasoning: Both BetBoom Team and OG have shown strong recent performances, with BetBoom having a slightly better win rate and head-to-head record. However, given the competitive nature of the matchup and the recent improvements by OG, it's a close call that doesn't present a clear advantage for betting.

opus.response:
MARKET 1: YES
Reasoning: The news confirms that Lilo & Stitch has already surpassed $1 billion globally and is currently the second-highest-grossing film of 2025. With the year nearly over, this position appears secure.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: Multiple forecasts project Avatar: Fire and Ash opening between $100-165 million, with several estimates exceeding the $123 million threshold. The holiday release timing and increased premium screens support a strong opening above this mark.

MARKET 3: YES
Reasoning: BetBoom Team has a superior recent win rate (64% vs 59%) and a favorable head-to-head record against OG (5-2), making them the stronger pick in this BO3 matchup.

gemini.response:
MARKET 1: YES
Reasoning: The news explicitly states that as of December 12, 2025, "Lilo & Stitch" has already become the second-highest-grossing film of the year, directly confirming the "Yes" outcome.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: Projections for "Avatar: Fire and Ash" opening weekend box office range from $100M-$130M and $135M-$165M, with the news specifically stating it is "expected to surpass the $123 million mark," contrary to the current market price leaning "No."

MARKET 3: NO_TRADE
Reasoning: The market is trading at $1,000.00 on BetBoom Team, indicating a 100% probability, which leaves no profit margin and carries unnecessary risk, as even with favorable stats, no competitive match is a guaranteed win.

deepseek.response:
MARKET 1: YES  
Reasoning: The news confirms that as of December 12, 2025, "Lilo & Stitch" is already the second-highest-grossing film of the year, having surpassed $1 billion globally, making a YES bet highly probable.

MARKET 2: YES  
Reasoning: Projections from recent news indicate an opening weekend forecast of $100M-$165M, with multiple sources expecting it to exceed $123M, especially given the holiday release and increased premium screen count.

MARKET 3: YES  
Reasoning: BetBoom Team holds a stronger recent win rate (64% vs. 59%) and a dominant head-to-head record (5-2) against OG, making them the favorable pick in this match-up.

claude.response:
MARKET 1: NO_TRADE
Reasoning: The news context appears to be from a hypothetical future (dated December 12, 2025, claiming the film already grossed $1B), which is impossible since we're currently in late 2024. Without reliable real-world data about the actual 2025 release and competition, this market carries too much uncertainty to trade confidently.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: Multiple box office tracking sources project Avatar: Fire and Ash's opening weekend between $135-165M, well above the $123M threshold. The holiday release timing, increased premium screens, and the Avatar franchise's proven track record support these bullish projections.

MARKET 3: NO_TRADE
Reasoning: While BetBoom Team has a superior head-to-head record (5-2) and slightly better recent win rate (64% vs 59%), the recent $1,000 bet on BetBoom likely moved odds significantly. Without knowing current market prices, it's difficult to assess if value remains on either side of this matchup.
